verses.text: \w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: “\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w giving|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* stones \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w coat|strong="H7874"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* plaster.

\w Write|strong="H3789"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w enter|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w these|strong="H6965"\w* stones \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w commanding|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w coat|strong="H7874"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* plaster.

Moreover, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* stones. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w use|strong="H5130"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w tool|strong="H5130"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w uncut|strong="H8003"\w* stones \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, eating \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H8451"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* distinctly \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* stones \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: “\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w silent|strong="H5535"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*! \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w follow|strong="H6213"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w giving|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.”
\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

“\w When|strong="H5674"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w tribes|strong="H5975"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gerizim|strong="H1630"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2022"\w* these \w tribes|strong="H5975"\w* \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* deliver \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*: \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, Asher, \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* proclaim \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w loud|strong="H7311"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w*:

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w makes|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w carved|strong="H6213"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w* \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w*—\w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w craftsman|strong="H2796"\w*—\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sets|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w secret|strong="H5643"\w*.’ \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w dishonors|strong="H7034"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father \w or|strong="H5971"\w* mother.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* moves \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*’s \w boundary|strong="H1366"\w* stone.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* lets \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w wander|strong="H7686"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w*.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* withholds \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w or|strong="H1616"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* widow.’ \w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sleeps|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father’s wife, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* violated \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father’s marriage \w bed|strong="H7901"\w*.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w let|strong="H1540"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w lies|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* animal.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sleeps|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sister, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father \w or|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sleeps|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother-in-law.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w strikes|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w secret|strong="H5643"\w*.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w accepts|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bribe|strong="H7810"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w*.’ \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘Amen!’

‘Cursed \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w practice|strong="H6213"\w*.’ \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘Amen!’
